annotations.description: The Pisco sour is your favourite cocktail? Learn how to make this simple riff on the classic in less the 5 minutes. #piscosour #cocktail #cocktailrecipe This...
annotations.title: Delicious riff on the Pisco sour - Learn how to make simple cocktail recipes at home

textContent:
2 oz Pisco
0.75 oz Maraschino liqueur
0.75 oz Watermelon juice (or 3-4 pieces of muddled fresh watermelon)
0.75 oz Fresh lemon juice
4 Dashes Angostura orange bitters

Shake all ingredients over ice and strain in a chilled cocktail coupe. Garnish and enjoy!
Garnish with 2 spritz of absinth and a star anis

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SQaDnIsKAIE
title: Watermelon Pisco Sour
